Title: Episode 1
Plot: Two years have passed and the once-unbreakable bond between best friends Katie, Trudi, Jessica and Siobhan has been shattered. As the girls gather it's clear their relationship has changed dramatically: there's tension in the room and no happy greetings. What could have happened to bring them to this?
ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.
